verses.verse: To the chief Musician<WH5329>, A Psalm<WH4210> or Song<WH7892> of David<WH1732>. Let God<WH430> arise<WH6965>, let his enemies<WH341> be scattered<WH6327>: let them also that hate<WH8130> him flee<WH5127> before<WH6440> him. before: Heb. from his face

As smoke<WH6227> is driven away<WH5086>, so drive them away<WH5086>: as wax<WH1749> melteth<WH4549> before<WH6440> the fire<WH784>, so let the wicked<WH7563> perish<WH6> at the presence<WH6440> of God<WH430>.
But let the righteous<WH6662> be glad<WH8055>; let them rejoice<WH5970> before<WH6440> God<WH430>: yea, let them exceedingly<WH8057> rejoice<WH7797>. exceedingly: Heb. rejoice with gladness

Sing<WH7891> unto God<WH430>, sing praises<WH2167> to his name<WH8034>: extol<WH5549> him that rideth<WH7392> upon the heavens<WH6160> by his name<WH8034> JAH<WH3050>, and rejoice<WH5937> before<WH6440> him.
A father<WH1> of the fatherless<WH3490>, and a judge<WH1781> of the widows<WH490>, is God<WH430> in his holy<WH6944> habitation<WH4583>.

God<WH430> setteth<WH3427> the solitary<WH3173> in families<WH1004>: he bringeth out<WH3318> those which are bound<WH615> with chains<WH3574>: but the rebellious<WH5637> dwell<WH7931> in a dry<WH6707> land. in families: Heb. in a house
O God<WH430>, when thou wentest forth<WH3318> before<WH6440> thy people<WH5971>, when thou didst march<WH6805> through the wilderness<WH3452>; Selah<WH5542>:

The earth<WH776> shook<WH7493>, the heavens<WH8064> also dropped<WH5197> at the presence<WH6440> of God<WH430>: even Sinai<WH5514> itself<WH2088> was moved at the presence<WH6440> of God<WH430>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>.

Thou, O God<WH430>, didst send<WH5130> a plentiful<WH5071> rain<WH1653>, whereby thou didst confirm<WH3559> thine inheritance<WH5159>, when it was weary<WH3811>. send: Heb. shake out confirm: Heb. confirm it
Thy congregation<WH2416> hath dwelt<WH3427> therein: thou, O God<WH430>, hast prepared<WH3559> of thy goodness<WH2896> for the poor<WH6041>.
The Lord<WH136> gave<WH5414> the word<WH562>: great<WH7227> was the company<WH6635> of those that published<WH1319> it. company: Heb. army
Kings<WH4428> of armies<WH6635> did flee<WH5074> apace<WH5074>: and she that tarried<WH5116> at home<WH1004> divided<WH2505> the spoil<WH7998>. did: Heb. did flee, did flee

Though ye have lien<WH7901> among the pots<WH8240>, yet shall ye be as the wings<WH3671> of a dove<WH3123> covered<WH2645> with silver<WH3701>, and her feathers<WH84> with yellow<WH3422> gold<WH2742>.
When the Almighty<WH7706> scattered<WH6566> kings<WH4428> in it, it was white as snow<WH7949> in Salmon<WH6756>. in it: or, for her, she
The hill<WH2022> of God<WH430> is as the hill<WH2022> of Bashan<WH1316>; an high<WH1386> hill<WH2022> as the hill<WH2022> of Bashan<WH1316>.
Why leap<WH7520> ye, ye high<WH1386> hills<WH2022>? this is the hill<WH2022> which God<WH430> desireth<WH2530> to dwell in<WH3427>; yea, the LORD<WH3068> will dwell<WH7931> in it for ever<WH5331>.

The chariots<WH7393> of God<WH430> are twenty thousand<WH7239>, even thousands<WH505> of angels<WH8136>: the Lord<WH136> is among them, as in Sinai<WH5514>, in the holy<WH6944> place. even: or, even many thousands

Thou hast ascended<WH5927> on high<WH4791>, thou hast led captivity<WH7628> captive<WH7617>: thou hast received<WH3947> gifts<WH4979> for men<WH120>; yea, for the rebellious<WH5637> also, that the LORD<WH3050> God<WH430> might dwell<WH7931> among them. for men: Heb. in the man
Blessed<WH1288> be the Lord<WH136>, who daily<WH3117> <WH3117> loadeth<WH6006> us with benefits, even the God<WH410> of our salvation<WH3444>. Selah<WH5542>.
He that is our God<WH410> is the God<WH410> of salvation<WH4190>; and unto GOD<WH3069> the Lord<WH136> belong the issues<WH8444> from death<WH4194>.
But God<WH430> shall wound<WH4272> the head<WH7218> of his enemies<WH341>, and the hairy<WH8181> scalp<WH6936> of such an one as goeth on still<WH1980> in his trespasses<WH817>.
The Lord<WH136> said<WH559>, I will bring again<WH7725> from Bashan<WH1316>, I will bring my people again<WH7725> from the depths<WH4688> of the sea<WH3220>:
That thy foot<WH7272> may be dipped<WH4272> in the blood<WH1818> of thine enemies<WH341>, and the tongue<WH3956> of thy dogs<WH3611> in the same. dipped: or, red
They have seen<WH7200> thy goings<WH1979>, O God<WH430>; even the goings<WH1979> of my God<WH410>, my King<WH4428>, in the sanctuary<WH6944>.
The singers<WH7891> went before<WH6923>, the players on instruments<WH5059> followed after<WH310>; among<WH8432> them were the damsels<WH5959> playing with timbrels<WH8608>.
Bless<WH1288> ye God<WH430> in the congregations<WH4721>, even the Lord<WH136>, from the fountain<WH4726> of Israel<WH3478>. from: or, ye that are of the fountain of Israel

There is little<WH6810> Benjamin<WH1144> with their ruler<WH7287>, the princes<WH8269> of Judah<WH3063> and their council<WH7277>, the princes<WH8269> of Zebulun<WH2074>, and the princes<WH8269> of Naphtali<WH5321>. and their: or, with their company
Thy God<WH430> hath commanded<WH6680> thy strength<WH5797>: strengthen<WH5810>, O God<WH430>, that which<WH2098> thou hast wrought<WH6466> for us.
Because of thy temple<WH1964> at Jerusalem<WH3389> shall kings<WH4428> bring<WH2986> presents<WH7862> unto thee.

Rebuke<WH1605> the company<WH2416> of spearmen<WH7070>, the multitude<WH5712> of the bulls<WH47>, with the calves<WH5695> of the people<WH5971>, till every one submit<WH7511> himself with pieces<WH7518> of silver<WH3701>: scatter<WH967> thou the people<WH5971> that delight<WH2654> in war<WH7128>. the company: or, the beasts of the reeds scatter: or, he scattereth
Princes<WH2831> shall come out<WH857> of Egypt<WH4714>; Ethiopia<WH3568> shall soon stretch out<WH7323> her hands<WH3027> unto God<WH430>.
Sing<WH7891> unto God<WH430>, ye kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth<WH776>; O sing praises<WH2167> unto the Lord<WH136>; Selah<WH5542>:

To him that rideth<WH7392> upon the heavens<WH8064> of heavens<WH8064>, which were of old<WH6924>; lo, he doth send out<WH5414> his voice<WH6963>, and that a mighty<WH5797> voice<WH6963>. send: Heb. give
Ascribe<WH5414> ye strength<WH5797> unto God<WH430>: his excellency<WH1346> is over Israel<WH3478>, and his strength<WH5797> is in the clouds<WH7834>. clouds: or, heavens

O God<WH430>, thou art terrible<WH3372> out of thy holy places<WH4720>: the God<WH410> of Israel<WH3478> is he that giveth<WH5414> strength<WH5797> and power<WH8592> unto his people<WH5971>. Blessed<WH1288> be God<WH430>.
